content.rendered:
We are delighted that you would like to invite Interim President Risa Dickson to your event. The President is eager to represent the University of La Verne and support various campus and community activities.

To begin the request process, please complete the form at least six weeks in advance and no less than four weeks before your event. This will help us gather the necessary details to ensure the President’s participation.

 

Please follow these procedures to complete your request:

  • Request: Use this form to request the president’s attendance at your event. We would like to receive your request as early as possible (ideally six weeks or sooner) before your event. Please note that we cannot guarantee availability and approval of requests received within four weeks of your event date. If you have questions, please contact Yvette Lane, Chief of Staff, at ylane@laverne.edu. 
  • Review: The President’s Office will review your request and the President’s schedule, then reply to the email address on the invitation request

 

Preparation Materials

If the president is able to attend your event, you will be asked to provide the following materials:

  • Event invitation
  • Suggested talking points
  • Briefing materials
  • Run of show
  • Guest list

 

Contacts:

  • Scheduling, briefing, or general questions: Yvette Lane at ylane@laverne.edu
  • Talking points: Savannah Thomas at sthomas@laverne.edu
